title: Kimberley Cops. Ep. 02: End of the road
creator_contributor_role: Film Finance Corporation Australia, production company
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Tracking and trailing
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Police - Australia
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Western Australia - Social life and customs
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Social isolation
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social isolation
description: This episode of "Kimberley Cops", a documentary series that relates the hardships and hazards for police stationed in isolated parts of Australia, focuses on the experiences of Hills Creek police officers. The rain season has arrived and we follow them as they travel to areas which will soon become inaccessible by road. The program captures the efforts of police to rectify past relations with Aboriginals in the area, particularly children, in developing mutual trust and respect.
